level.description: Next step is learning about how to use different variable types.
level.how: When we want to use text we use quotation marks ''. Other wise we dont use anything for a number
level.task: Create one variable to store the string 'Hello World!, and another to store the number 8.

level.description: We don't need to specify the types
level.task: In the form of: String: var variableName = 'STRING HERE'; Number: var variableName = NumberVALUE

level.description: Remember to always give variables good names!
level.task: Which for this example looks like: String: var stringVariable = 'Hello World!'; and Number: var numberVariable = 8;
